channel.title: Do I need to save torrc file?
channel.description:
hello,
After editing my torrc file in the gateway terminal do I need to save and overwrite the torrc file or leave it open and proceed to Workstation.

item.description:

item.title: Do I need to save torrc file?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Save/overwrite. Donâ€™t forget to reload or restart Tor so changes take effect.

After that, keeping torrc open or closing it does not matter. What you prefer.
